short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will direct a user to the non-mobile version of a website if they are on the mobile version.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will direct a user to the non-mobile version of a website if they are on the mobile version of said website. It is specifically geared towards the mobile Wikipedia and Reddit website, though I will try to update it to work with others.
